page.title: 12Customs 2--Denny & Dunipace
page.content: {Gala Day.}This takes place in June. The Gala Queen is a girl from one of the primary schools. She and her attendants, all in fine costumes, parade through the town in decorated floats. All primary school children go and are given bags of good things to eat, drinks and ice-cream. It is great fun. {Hallowe'en.}We have a party at school. Everyone dresses up as witches, warlocks or something mysterious. We dook for apples, eat clootie dumpling and play games. After school, many of us go out{guising.}We go round houses singing and dancing and are given apples, nuts and money. We wear our fancy clothes. {Hanselling.}When a new baby is taken out for the first time, people give the child a silver coin, say 50p, for luck.
